name: Animal Antics (bejules)
description:
A snail, a bird, and a cat walk into a meteor. And a cavern of shadows. And a secret laboratory. What kinds of crazy antics are these animals getting themselves into?

This game was made in 48 hours for Northeastern University's "Slice of Jam" game jam!

Credits:

@lennie_ok - Character Art

Julia Sherbal - Programming

Justin Lewis - Narrative
